reviews.review: за 464 часа мне успели высказать кем я буду работать кто мои родители кто я и кем роботают мои родители игру советую
JOGO É ÓTIMO, PENA  Q ESTRAGO MINHA VIDA.

Filled with cheaters scammers and in general unpleasent people. This game is dead and has been so for a long time. Playernumbers dont refelct the actuall ingame experience. It seems at an all time high with playernumbers bursting numbers from back in the day. From my experience tho its safe to say that at least half a million of all the active accounts consist of cheaters, scam accounts and traiding bots. The rest of the game isnt better. New content releases every other year or so and is never really that good. Servers are abysmal and matchmaking takes for ever. The ammount of cheaters youll meet NO MATTER what type of mode or rank you play at is insane. The game is only a shadow of its former self. Neglected by its developers for a long time and only thought about if actual competition arrises. This game is horrible. And i dont see that changing anytime soon. This is a review from a loyal fan who loved this game to bits and looked over a lot of things over the past 7 years of me playing this game. But in the end even the most die-hard fans cant deny any of these claims. I dont recommend this game to anyone. Especially not to someone who is new to the world of shooter games and is looking for a fun time. I dont want to make anyone leave a game they love. But from the general consensus i havent seen anyone disagreeing with me. Its sad really. Very fucking sad.
